      • displayResultSet

        public static void displayResultSet(java.sql.ResultSet rs)
                             throws java.sql.SQLException
        This method displays all columns and rows in the given result set.
        Parameters:
        rs - The result set to be displayed.
        Throws:
        SQLException.
        java.sql.SQLException

      • printSQLWarnings

        public static boolean printSQLWarnings(java.sql.SQLWarning warn)
                                throws java.sql.SQLException
        This method checks for warnings and displays the warnings' information. Note that multiple warning objects could be chained together. Very similar to printSQLExceptions.
        Parameters:
        warn - The list of SQLWarnings.
        Returns:
        true if a warning existed, false otherwise.
        Throws:
        SQLException.
        SQLException.
        java.sql.SQLException
        See Also:
        Utils#printSQLExceptions

      • printSQLExceptions

        public static boolean printSQLExceptions(java.sql.SQLException ex)
        This method checks for exceptions and displays error information. Note that multiple exception objects could be chained together. Very similar to printSQLWarnings.
        Parameters:
        warn - The list of SQLException.
        Returns:
        true if an exception existed, false otherwise.
        See Also:
        Utils#printSQLWarnings

      • printSQLExceptions

        public static boolean printSQLExceptions(java.lang.String method,
                                         java.sql.SQLException ex)

      • printDriverInfo

        public static void printDriverInfo(java.sql.Connection con)
                            throws java.sql.SQLException
        This method displays driver name and version.
        Parameters:
        con - The current connection.
        Throws:
        SQLException.
        java.sql.SQLException
